summary: Companions and Followers Replacer, Used Pure Skin Texture and many beauty mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#ff7700][url=https://flic.kr/p/GnJvS1][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1565/26500212296_0287ee0f77_c.jpg[/img][/url]
!!My Mod is Not Lore Friendly !![/color]
[/size]
[size=4]This mod will change appearances of DLC Dawnguard Heroines.  Sorine Jurard, Ingjard, Vori, Beleval. 

Total, Four Girls.

[color=#ff7700]Non HDT UUNP and UUNP, CBBE body types ,
Merged and individual esp offered.
[/color]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/FZyJRo][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1685/26249341960_9065a87eea_c.jpg[/img]

[/url][/size][color=#ff0000][size=5]i.Required
[/size][/color][size=4]This Mod is standalone.
1.9.32 Version Skyrim and Dawnguard.[/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]
ii.Recommend[/size][/color]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]This Mod is compatible with [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT.(Follower control mod.)[/url] 
Load My mod after any follower control mod's esp.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP 32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url].
